page.title: 07Communications In B. Monkton
page.content: {Radio}and{Television}reception is satisfactory in the area,and although the local commercial transmitter of Yorkshire Television gives a poor signal,the signals from the commercial transmitter of Tyne-Tees Television and the associated BBC transmitters are generally good. The great majority of houses and farms have{telephones},and there is a public callbox outside the sub-Post Office in Bishop Monkton.{Newspapers}are on sale and delivered daily on weekdays from the Bishop Monkton sub-Post Office,and on Sunday a delivery service is provided from Harrogate (about 8 miles distant).There is a{postal}delivery every morning except Sundays and Public Holidays,and in addition to the service provided by the Post Office there are 2 post-boxes in the village, cleared twice daily on weekdays.
